name: For King and Kingdom
description:
Story

Your Kingdom has been invaded by a neighbouring kingdom. Your army has been defeated and the enemies are moving towards the capital to kill the king.  You a stuck behind enemy lines and must fight through the enemy and make it to the capital and save Your king. 

Controls

  • Left control - attack
  • Space - jump
  • Left and right arrow keys - move left and right

Music: Winter Night by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
